CustomField.description:
Green = On Track to next KPI Date
Yellow = At Risk for next KPI Date
Red = Behind next KPI Date
Rainbow = All Critical Dates Done!
CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Plan_Type__c )="Conversion Plan", "", IF( TEXT(Progress_Tracker_Report__c) = "On Track", IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0681G000004LO3p&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T1G00000DnSIX", "",30,60), IF( TEXT(Progress_Tracker_Report__c) = "At Risk", IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0681G000004LO3u&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T1G00000DnSIc", "",30,60), IF( TEXT(Progress_Tracker_Report__c) = "Behind", IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0681G000004LO3z&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T1G00000DnSIh", "",30,60), IMAGE("https://myubiquity.file.force.com/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0681G000004MPDt&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T1G00000FcXZF", "",30,60)))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Green = On Track to next KPI Date
Yellow = At Risk for next KPI Date
Red = Behind next KPI Date
Rainbow = All Critical Dates Done!
CustomField.label: Progress Tracker
